title.rendered: Position, Price & Pitch: The 3 Ps to Growing Your Agency

content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”bottom” css=”.vc_custom_1551475411347{border-bottom-width: 5px !important;padding-top: 15% !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;background: #666468 url(http://sharpspring.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/09/single-resource-page-1902×496.png?id=158417) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;border-bottom-color: #f5f5f5 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1525274666229{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Position, Price & Pitch: The 3 Ps to Growing Your Agency

A Webinar Presented by Karl Sakas

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_hidden-sm vc_col-xs-12 vc_hidden-xs”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1525275406838{padding-top: 2% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1525275661232{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]
Actionable tips to selling marketing automation services
[vc_column_text el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron register-text”]Looking for ways to work marketing automation into your agency pricing model?

Tune in to hear renowned agency consultant and coach Karl Sakas discuss how you can package marketing automation services within a proven framework. He’ll give actionable tips on how to:

  • Segment your agency services into 3 easy tiers
  • Price & bundle marketing automation within each tier
  • Get more revenue per client by switching up your approach

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron passedEvent-text”]Looking for ways to work marketing automation into your agency pricing model?

Check out this on-demand webinar to hear renowned agency consultant and coach Karl Sakas discuss how you can package marketing automation services within a proven framework. He gives actionable tips on how to:

  • Segment your agency services into 3 easy tiers
  • Price & bundle marketing automation within each tier
  • Get more revenue per client by switching up your approach

[/vc_column_text]

Your Host

Karl Sakas

Agency Advisor, Sakas & Company

Agency growth is good… unless it gets out of control. Karl Sakas (@KarlSakas) helps agency owners increase their profits and reduce their stress, by conquering growing pains. As management consultant and executive coach at Sakas & Company, Karl has personally advised hundreds of agencies on every inhabited continent. He is the author of Made to Lead, The In-Demand Marketing Agency, and more than 300 articles on agency management. When he’s not helping clients, Karl is an award-winning Past President of AMA Triangle and volunteers as a bartender on a 1930s railroad car. Get a free copy of his eBook Don’t Just Make the Logo Bigger: Taking Clients from Painful to Profitable when you sign up for his free weekly tips.read more...

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1525274338786{margin-top: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;}” el_class=”m-t-minus-25-percent”][vc_raw_html el_id=”register”][/vc_raw_html][vc_raw_html el_id=”passedEvent”][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”js-btn-scroll-to btn-scroll-to”][vc_column]
